content:
Hi all, I can't remember when the next 'regular' FHIR-I call is (holidays), so I'm posting this today (May 24): Block Vote 2. Assuming the next call is either next Monday (May 31) or the one after (June 7), I would like it to be on the agenda.

If anyone has any items they would like removed from the Block, please let me know. Thanks!
We have a call on next Monday (31), but it may be a shorter one
